The game  had virus on somewhere.

For those of you that get the virus-warning. If your virus-program is warning you about the file GMOD10[final].exe or something like that, just put it in the virus vault.

Next step is to create a shortcut to HL2.exe. Rightclick the shortcut and click properties. In the "Target" box it should say something like 
X:\games\Garrys Mod\hl2.exe
Add to the end of that:
-steam -console -appid 4000 -game "garrysmod"...hl2.exe.open

The result should be
X:\games\Garrys Mod\hl2.exe -steam -console -appid 4000 -game "garrysmod"...hl2.exe.open

You should be good to go now.
